original_title: Bordo Mavi: The Inside Tale of Trabzonspor
overview: An original documentary produced by Tasos Bakasetas and Stars Inc. 11. Witness Trabzonspor's journey to the first Super Lig title in 38 years. Experience the personal, behind the scenes stories, the celebrations and the player’s point of view.  See the cultural elements of Trabzon and how football affects the everyday life of the city that lives for its club. A fascinating story that was meant to be told.
title: Bordo Mavi: The Inside Tale of Trabzonspor
